snippet: New releases: “Ice Choir,” the new project of Kurt Feldman; Elle Varner’s debut album, “Perfectly Imperfect”; and “Renaissance,” from the bass player Marcus Miller.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews full-length album from rock project Ice Choir; Nate Chinen reviews new releases from R&B singer Elle Varner and jazz bassist Marcus Miller.

byline.original: By JON CARAMANICA and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: New releases: “Ice Choir,” the new project of Kurt Feldman; Elle Varner’s debut album, “Perfectly Imperfect”; and “Renaissance,” from the bass player Marcus Miller.

headline.seo: Releases From Kurt Feldman, Elle Varner and Marcus Miller
headline.main: Releases From Kurt Feldman, Elle Varner and Marcus Miller
